View Visualizer Module

File where is located the visualizers.

class proteus.view.visualizer.Visualizer

Class to render and visualizing views.

eventFilter(obj, event)

If the user presses the Escape key, clear the search text.

focus(id: str) → None

Focus an object in html document. Automatically scrolls to object.

Parameters:

id – Id of object to focus.

handleLoaded(ok)

Handle inspector loaded

load(view: str, project: Project, index: int)

Compiles current view and set html to QWebEngineView.

Parameters:

  • view – view to load.

  • project – project data.

  • index – selected document index.

save_html(save_path: str) → None

Saves view onto a html document.

Parameters:

save_path – file path.

save_pdf(save_path: str) → None

Saves view onto a pdf document.

Parameters:

save_path – file path.

setView(view: int) → None

Sets current view.

Parameters:

view – Current view index.

show_search_dialog()

Show the search dialog and search for the text entered by the user.

update(project: dict, index: int) → None

Updates view on project changes.

Parameters:

  • project – updated project dict.

  • index – selected document index.

update_html(project: dict, index: int) → None

Send project data to html view.

Parameters:

  • project – project data.

  • index – current document index.

update_xslt(project: Project, index: int) → None

Compiles XSLT view and set updated html to page.

Parameters:

  • project – project data.

  • index – current document index.

proteus.view.visualizer.convert_black_white(image_url: str) → str

Convert image to black and white.

proteus.view.visualizer.convert_markdown(elements)

Convert XSLT element to markdown.

proteus.view.visualizer.send_to_view(project, page, index=0)

Sends project data to view in JSON format.
